modName: Mahty's Dwarven Rifles 2nd Generation - English Overhaul
summary: Given permission by Mahty I have reworked the 2nd Generation Dwarven Rifles mod so that each weapon makes use of the J3X scripts.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#ff9900]Preamble[/color][/size]
Mahty is to me the definitive Dwemer modder. Everything mahty releases is awesome, and as such I pay close heed to it. When I got the 2nd Generation Dwemer Gun mod (found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54498/?) I was disappointed that the guns didn't make more use of the J3X weapon scripts. So I made a change to Mahty's file and got permission to share it.

[size=4][color=#ff8900]Description[/color][/size]
This mod does several things read below to see for each weapon.

[size=3][color=#ff7900]Dwemer Gatling Rifle[/color][/size]
DMG: 2
S/s: ~100/s AUTOMATIC
Clip: 200

[size=3][color=#ff7400]Dwemer Sniper Rifle[/color][/size]
DMG: 30
S/s: Standard Crossbow
Clip: 1

[size=3][color=#ff6900]Dwemer Aetherium Rifle[/color][/size]
DMG: 4
S/s: 3 burst
Clip: 21

[size=3][color=#ff6400]Dwemer Aetherium Rifle II[/color][/size]
DMG: 4
S/s: 10/s AUTOMATIC
Clip: 30

[size=3][color=#ff5900]Dwemer SMG[/color][/size]
DMG: 3
S/s: 10/s AUTOMATIC
Clip: 30

[size=3][color=#ff5400]Dwemer Assault Rifle[/color][/size]
DMG: 4
S/s: 10/s AUTOMATIC
Clip: 30

[size=3][color=#ff4900]Dwemer Marksman Rifle[/color][/size]
DMG: 10
S/s: 10/s SEMI-AUTOMATIC
Clip: 30

[size=3][color=#ff4400]Dwemer Grenade Rifle[/color][/size]
Unchanged save name

[size=3][color=#ff3900]Dwemer Accelerator[/color][/size]
Damage reduced to 25

[size=3][color=#ff3400]Ammunition[/color][/size]
Normal Bullet, Aetherium Bullet, Sniper Bullet, and Shot Lance have all had their damage reduced.
They make sense being used with these now much more powerful 'guns' but not in standard crossbows.

[size=4][color=#ff2900]Installation[/color][/size]
Install it with NMM or other mod managers for ease of use.
Or manually drop it in this folder:
C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonSkyrimData

It overwrites Mahty's Dwarven rifle 2nd Generation .esp

[size=4][color=#33ff66]Requirements[/color][/size]
This mod requires Mahty's: Dwarven rifle 2nd Generation
Found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54498/?
And it also requires J3X's: Automatic Crossbows
Found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26329/?

[size=4][color=#ff1900]Thanks[/color][/size]
J3X for the fantastic Automatic crossbows scripts, both easy to mod and fantastically versatile.
And of course Mahty.
author: Aidanator
